job.title: Data Scientist

variations to deliver great products at great prices to our customersltbrgtltbrgtyou will be working closely with other data scientists machine learning engineers operations research scientists data we work with various techniques from machine learning classical machine learning deep learning reinforcement learning operations research causal inference and statistics our work has been published in
